Articles.Content:
this is a stealth plane that i made

it has a delta wing shape with 3 engines

it can easily reach Mach 2

and is very stable

even in tight turns

i hope you like it

Please reply
Three engines cant make you go that fast... especially if you are in the atmosphere.
you got the same lighting problem i friend of mine had

Yes it can

Easily

I got up to 700mps

and i was only 8km up (well in the atmosphere)

Here\'s an idea for you!

Replace the middle tanks with the normal rocket tanks, and the jet engine with the aerospike engine, and you\'ll have an SSTO on your hands!

Also, TB, I can confirm his claim of going Mach 2. I\'ve done it myself with a similar jet.

Here\'s an idea for you!

Replace the middle tanks with the normal rocket tanks, and the jet engine with the aerospike engine, and you\'ll have an SSTO on your hands!

Also, TB, I can confirm his claim of going Mach 2. I\'ve done it myself with a similar jet.

Thanks for backing me up

and thanks for the advise
you might wana try puting the plane into a rocket and put it in space you know by puting it in to virtical mode and atach some solid bosters or a few fuel tankes with some engens
